description: '''Pakistani hip-hop''' is a music genre in [[Pakistan]], heavily influenced by merging [[American hip hop|American hip-hop]] style beats with [[Pakistani poetry]]. The genre was initially dominated by [[English language|English]] and [[Punjabi language|Punjabi]], but in recent years has expanded to include [[Urdu]], [[Sindhi language|Sindhi]], [[Pashto]], and [[Balochi language|Balochi]].
